name: FImageWriteOptions
doc: Options specific to writing image files to disk

Format: The desired output image format to write to disk
OnComplete: A callback to invoke when the image has been written, or there was an error
CompressionQuality: An image format specific compression setting. Either 0 (Default) or 1 (Uncompressed) for EXRs, or a value between 0 and 100.
bOverwriteFile: Whether to overwrite the image if it already exists
bAsync: Whether to perform the writing asynchronously, or to block the game thread until it is complete
